com.schibsted.android.sdk
Class SPiDWebViewClient

java.lang.Object
  android.webkit.WebViewClient
      com.schibsted.android.sdk.SPiDWebViewClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
SPiDExampleAppLogin.SPiDExampleWebViewClient
public class SPiDWebViewClient
extends android.webkit.WebViewClient

SPiD implementation of WebViewClient, it should be subclassed if a custom WebViewClient is needed

onReceivedError

public void onReceivedError(android.webkit.WebView view,
                            int errorCode,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            java.lang.String failingUrl)
Called when the WebView encounters a unrecoverable error.

Overrides:
onReceivedError in class android.webkit.WebViewClient
Parameters:
view - The WebView that is initiating the callback.
errorCode - The error code corresponding to an ERROR_* value.
description - A String describing the error.
failingUrl - The url that failed to load.

shouldOverrideUrlLoading

public boolean shouldOverrideUrlLoading(android.webkit.WebView view,
                                        java.lang.String url)
Checks if the url should be loaded in the WebView or if its a application callback.

Overrides:
shouldOverrideUrlLoading in class android.webkit.WebViewClient
Parameters:
view - The WebView that is initiating the callback.
url - The url to be loaded.
Returns:
True if the host application wants to leave the current WebView and handle the url itself, otherwise return false
